name: Furry Obscurity
description:
A Game Jam game that I worked on during my Sophomore year

The theme was chosen by a majority vote, and I lost...

You've checked your family into your hotel, but have just discovered that there is a furry convention next door and many of the patrons are staying with you. You can't have your children find out about these people, so you are tasked with hiding them around various areas inside the hotel. But be warned, for the children will likely leave their spot and go explore on their own. Hide them before its too late.
